product_name: Swany Legend II Touch-Screen Mittens - Men's
long_description: Inner tech-compatible fleece gloves emerge from a side zip on these insulated leather mittens, letting you adjust your goggles, take a photo or use your phone without exposing your hands.
short_description: Inner tech-compatible fleece gloves emerge from a side zip on these insulated leather mittens, letting you adjust your goggles, take a photo or use your phone without exposing your hands.
